. Police charged him and the case has been pending ever since. It's the`` douche bag'' phrase that has riled up Maytin. In July she filed a six-page court brief- aptly titled Motion to Dismiss: The Constitutionality of` Douche Bag.' Maytin contended that the disorderly conduct charge should have been dropped because Fordham was protected by free speech. She cited numerous sources to back her claim- ranging from Wikipedia to the Urban Dictionary to David Letterman .

Mike Pence met earlier in the day with officials including Republican Gov. Mitch Daniels , who can't run for third term and also is considering whether to enter the 2012 presidential campaign. Mike Pence singled Mitch Daniels out in his speech as the best governor in America. Mike Pence stepped down from his position as the No. 3 leader among U.S. House Republicans after winning re-election in November and has been receiving support from social conservatives to make a presidential run.
